      static double MolecularFormulaManipulator.getTotalExactMass​(IMolecularFormula formula)
      Deprecated.
      calls MolecularFormulaManipulator.getMass(IMolecularFormula, int) with option MolecularFormulaManipulator.MonoIsotopic and adjusts for charge with MolecularFormulaManipulator.correctMass(double, Integer).
